评论详情: This 2 piece outfit was comfortable and fit perfectly. It was perfect for my trip to Brasil! It even matched my Teva sandals pretty closely. Also the material was pretty good quality.

The set is great for summertime. The length of the shorts were perfect as it was neither too short or long. The top came just above the shorts and wasn’t too cropped. The material is thick enough to not be see through but breathable and comfortable for summertime. Good quality material. Did not shrink in the wash. Good value.
It’s definitely cute and comfortable, but the top fits bigger than what the advertised picture shows.

Things I like: It is comfortable, cute, and thick fabric (so it’s not showing everyone whatcha got under there…that’s a plus for me) Things that are unfavorable: The fabric is heavy, the waist band’s elastic is tight (I’m small and it’s tight for me 5’4 120lbs), the shirt has not stretch or give (so don’t try to put this shirt on after hair and makeup is done).  Extra: This outfit I plan on mixing the top with different shorts, but if I wore it as one it would be only at home. Maybe during cleaning the house or outside chores. The waist band looks better folded (as suggested on a video made in the reviews), but then the shorts go from a nice length to booty shorts.

Love this set, & will be ordering more. Soft waffle knot fabric with a thicker waste line & length of shorts are not bootie length. They are long enough that my thighs don’t rub together. Also love the strong waistband tie & pockets. The top also isn’t too baring & just a peak of skin is exposed. T back bra will work the best but also since the material is waffle print it gives more coverage than just a cotton top

评论概述: Top size and color waaaay off.
评论详情: I’m small. Ordered small. In the pictures, the top is short and cropped. Very stylish. Not even close! In reality, the top is long and very loose! Note - the picture is with a padded sports bra underneath!  And color is not like in pic either. Much, much lighter blue and extremely faded. Not nearly as intense as color in picture.  Very disappointed.
Fits true to size

I haven’t washed yet, but this set is so flattering and cute for summer! I am 5’3 and 145-150 lbs and I ordered a large. I’m also a pear shape. The top was a little big but I couldn’t have gone any smaller in the bottoms. I will definitely be ordering in more colors
Love this cute lounge set!

评论概述: Cute but wish they were sold separately!
评论详情: I’m loving this set. It’s so comfy, I love the length of the shorts, and the thick wasteband. The top is a perfect length but because I had to size up for the shorts to fit, it fits looser. I like when they’re tighter and I don’t have to wear a bra, but with this top I do feel like I have to wear one. Still obsessed though ! I ordered a L, I’m 5’ 5” 160lbs and have wide hips and butt, and a short torso.

I enjoy this set and it’s held up well through multiple washes! My only gripe is the tag on the top being an itchy nuisance. I even cut it out thinking that would help but it didn’t. But it’s not something that would deter me from wearing it. I’ve washed and dried on low with no problems of shrinkage, material is not too thick for summer wear, and it’s also not see through. I went up a couple of sizes just based off of other reviews and I enjoyed the extra coverage while not making me look like a whale. All in all I’d recommend the set to anyone looking for a cute casual look

评论概述: Comfortable just wish the top had more stretch
评论详情: I ordered a size up so the top wouldn’t be quite so cropped and I’m glad I did because the top has basically no stretch to it at all. Shorts are good though. It’s a cute, casual outfit for summer. For reference, I usually order L, but got XL on this.

This is definitely comfortable and worth the money. I got a lot of compliments on it! I ordered the beige, but the coloring was a little more yellow. It fits well and the top had slight transparency. I would buy again in a different color.
I did like the thick material, high neckline & dark color. The shorts were just a tad tighter than I originally wanted but still give it 4 stars! Just size up!

评论概述: Busty gals: it gaps at armpits
评论详情: I wanted to love this set & it was *so close* but I ended up returning it. I’m 5’4”, 155 lb, curvy hourglass & typically size 10-12. This was definitely the right size (large), but the shirt gapped at the armpits weirdly.  I also didn’t love that you’d HAVE to wear either a racerback or strapless bra with this.  The shorts were a stretchier fabric with more give than the fabric of the top. The neckline was hard to fit my head through.  I almost kept this set just for the shorts, they’re so comfy.  I hope they update & re-release this with those few changes to the top!

Four stars because the beige is definitely an off/pale yellow. But I still love the set! It’s great quality, and not see through at all. If you are between sizes and chesty, I’d recommend going up in size. I’ll be buying in more colors!
I usually wear a medium would size down to a small it fits but the shorts ars very baggy only thing I don't like. The fabric is light weight & soft.

Either I'm fatter than I think, or these run small! Historically, I'm a medium, sometimes large. I ordered a large thinking I would be safe, but alas, it didn't fit. The shorts were uncomfortable and the top wasn't a large cut.  I gave it to my daughter who is 21, 5'3, and a small/medium. It looked great on her.  I would order up a few sizes if you don't want the life pressed out of you.

评论概述: Came with a hole in a seam
评论详情: Besides the hole by the pocket I LOVE this set. Super cute and fits nicely. Good material. The hole should be easy to fix but kinda disappointed to have to fix a brand new pair of shorts.
Reminded me of night clothes. I wouldn't wear it in public. The quality was decent.
Great 👍
I got a large in this instead of medium and it fits absolutely perfect. Not tight not loose but just right. The color is way off but I don’t care this set is great I want another one!
Cute outfit. Comfy and great for hot summer days. However if you are busty, the top fits like a couple sizes too small.

Absolutely love! I ordered the tan one too I hope it’s not to see through! But this one is perfect! I’m a tall lady (5’9” 135lb I got a small) so when it’s actually “high rise” it’s great and long enough of a crop I love! Can’t wait to wear it to Disney!
Love the top but the bottoms are too tight to wear with the top

I order 2 colors. Love them both, does not shrink when washing. True to size, a good amount of stretch, cute little 2 piece for the price. I get dozens of compliments every time I wear. Not see through at all.

My bedding and other items for color hue reference. This is like a nice Easter yellow or spring yellow… if that’s something you’re looking for. Returning cuz I’m not into yellow, but also be warned the shorts are kinda see through, and pockets are super visible through the fabric.
Flattering and true to size - I followed the size chart in the description and it fits me great. I like the waffle texture. The top is not as cropped as I thought it would be, but it still works.

I love this matching two piece. For reference I am 5’5” and 149lbs and ordered a medium. The shorts are a little snug  as I do have 2 kids and a mom belly, I could have probably sized up to a L but the top fits great and the L may have been to big on top. It shows just a little belly and is super flattering.
The shorts fits nicely but the top was way too big for a large. Top is more like an XL.
very comfy great fit

Im usually not comfortable with my stomach showing but the way this fit made me feel confident enough to wear out in public which is a big deal for me. The pants and the top seemed to fit just right to show a tiny bit of stomach but not enough to make me self conscious. I really liked the fit of the top part. I have a more athletic type build and I feel like it accentuated my shoulders in just the right way. You do have to use a bra clip tho to pull the straps back as they will show outside the shirt if ypu don’t
Fits good, nice fabric

I recently purchased several items from Amazon and I’m loving this set right here. The set feels breathable, I love the color (it was just like the picture) I think I might purchase in black too but am still deciding.  I do wish that the top had a bit more stretch in it like the bottoms do. I would recommend this item.

This set is so cute and true to fit and color. The top has NO stretch so don’t think of it like a sports bra or anything. There’s no give to it. Inasmuch, it is so comfy, the shorts have pockets (ladies, iykyk), and I could wear this all day every day.

I cannot get enough of this set! The quality is amazing and the way the shorts are built are so flattering! They are high-rise but also long enough that I feel comfortable wearing them while being fairly active. I need this set in every color!

This two piece set is seriously the best. I ended up buying it in multiple colors because I love it so much. I’ve had 2 kids and don’t typically wear crop tops, etc. but I decided to try this anyways and loved it!  I did get an XL and it fits perfect! I’m 5’4, and weigh 165 lbs. I don’t like my clothes fitting super tight and I’m 12 weeks postpartum. I wore these in Disney and received a ton of compliments and felt great!
Does not have the same shape/support than it did when delivered. Fits a little less bit after every wash.
I’m 5’ 6” 110lbs and this is very flattering. Usually I have a hard time with these outfits making look too thin but this one hides the waist perfectly!

评论概述: Very comfy and true to size
评论详情: Loved this two piece set! I’m 5’9 and I weigh 206 and this fit perfectly, not too lose or too tight. I wore this for a museum date and also as a casual bar hopping fit. I’ve washed this set about 3x now and it is still true to size.

Ordered a size small (5'2, 100lb), expected a slightly oversized look but the shorts were so big that they wouldn't stay up. Top was also too big as well, even though I usually wear a Small in tops. Wish XS was an option :(

Perfect everyday wear! I love that you don’t even have to think about an outfit, just grab and go! Quality is great, I have two sets, the green and black. I have washed them so many times already and no shrinkage or discoloration! Definitely purchasing other colors!
This is great for summer just to hang out or workout in them on a Peloton.

评论概述: Crop top reallllly short for tall gal
评论详情: I'm 5'11". The crop tops was literally right under my chest. I would order a size up next time. I mean, it really is a very nice set, light weight and looks sharp. But since I'm already overweight, I'm not looking for maximum skin reveal,  lol. Tall girls beware. Or just order a. Size up maybe.
I live in theses outfits
One of my favorites lounge sets
Probably one of the most comfortable pieces! I want every color. Very flattering. Good price for a whole set! Not super thin or see through. I love it
Highly recommend! Really cute set. I’m 5’0 and 165lbs, I’m usually a large but sized up to an XL for more room and the fit is great.

A cute style and color as pictured. Not see through and feels like good quality. I’ve washed and dried a few times now and haven’t noticed any shrinkage. Overall I think it’s a versatile set that is worth the money.

评论概述: If you’re between sizes, go smaller
评论详情: Super cute! Quality is good. I’m between sizes and ordered the larger of the two. Still looks great but is a smidge baggy. Next time I’ll get the smaller size of the two.
I love this set, I want more in different colors and I normally don’t buy the same outfit in different colors :-)

I love this lounge set! The color is so cute and the material is extremely comfortable. My only qualms is that the shorts can cinch tight at the waist which is a bit uncomfortable and the tank seems to ride up. This may have been due to washing, but regardless it is one of my favorite things to wear around the house!
Cute and comfy set! Must have!
Love! Super comfy, cute, easy outfit. Deff mom bod friendly lol. Good quality, thick material. I’m gunna get more colors for sure. I’m 5’3 about 165lbs and I got a medium and it fit perfectly.
I thought this was pretty comfy, but the tank is like super cropped, like a sports bra length almost. I returned.
Very comfy and elegant for the price.
It fits me well and it perfect for running errands. I feel like I could get a lot of things done in this outfit. Size small. I'm 5'6" 130lbs 32D

The color was not even close to picture was more of a yellowed puse brown. Worst the fabric was stiff and scratchy. Fit was ok I bought a small but I couldn’t even handle wearing due to the itchy rough fabric. Cute idea but failed execution.
Product came fast and in good condition, the top is more cropped than in the picture, shorts are true to size, but top appears to run small. Perfect for lounging around or for a long car ride.

the overall color and description of the set looked the same i have no complaints there. I would say the main issue i had was that the waist band was so tight that it made it look like you have rolls  on the side and a muffin top. it wasn't flattering at all.
If you are larger on top size up because the top is definitely snug.  However the shorts fit perfect. I have not washed yet I feel it might shrink. I am wearing a size small I am 5’4 130 lbs.
The shorts are too big but the top fits good.
Love this set! I always get compliments when I wear it. The top fits more like a bralette now because it shrunk in the wash but other than that it’s been great!

评论概述: Cute idea but doesn’t fit right
评论详情: This is a super cute outfit but it does not fit right and I can tell that it will stretch out and not go back to the original size. The top is not tight under your breasts. There’s a big gap it just hangs loose which is not what I was expecting. The shorts fit nice if the top would have fit a little bit tighter I probably would have liked this outfit better, but it’s also the material that will stretch and not go back to the original size.
This outfit is so comfortable, it fits soooo well and it can be lounge wear , or worn to run errands . I love it ! Should buy it in every color

I purchased this “same” outfit from a different supplier on Amazon and I really liked it - I wanted another set in Gray, but they didn’t have it so I purchased this one. The photos are IDENTICAL, so I assumed it was like many other items you can find online that are mass produced in China and sold from several different sellers, but that’s not the case. The outfits were completely different. And this one is very awkward fitting. I am 5’6” 130lbs and I ordered a Medium (the recommended size, and the same size as the other one that fit great) and it was just all wrong. Both the top & bottom were huge, the cut of the top was weird/off, the shorts were too long and not in a good way (the other pair the shorts were sort of long too but very flattering, these were just straight) Just all around awkward, I returned it immediately. I gave 2 stars instead of 1 because the fabric was decent and it was packaged & tagged nicely, however I would not recommend.
It’s my go to Saturday outfit now.

Good light weight lounge set. The shorts have an oversized fit and sit high. The tank top is loose fitting. The material is thinner than expected. Happy with the quality for the price though! Got just what I wanted.
Cute. Fit true to size.
Gorgeous  color, very comfortable, perfect sizing, can dress it up of down!

评论概述: When comfort is what you need!
评论详情: So soft! Easy to wear!
Love this set. I’ve been looking for a good set for a while and I think I found it. It feels comfortable and is perfect for spring/summer.

I’m a 5”6 woman and weigh 180 pounds it’s hard for me to find clothes that accentuate my body, this set makes me look skinny and tucks my tummy away!! I love it!! Will be buying more in different colors
No elasticity and stiff fabric.

Based on other reviews, I bought this not expecting much from the top. The reviews are accurate. The top is loose-fitting and not as pictured. However, I bought mostly for the shorts and they’re great.
Apricot color is actually yellow. Quality was low as well. Don’t waste your money.
such a cute and comfortable matching set. Perfect for hot summer day!
Comfy and cute. Shorts fit great and are flattering even 4 weeks postpartum. Top comes up for easy access to nursing
Top is huge. Bottoms are super long and the material is very see through. Color was not tan more of a butter yellow
The material is cheaply made and itchy.
Very cute. Very comfy. The waffle material is breathable and cool.
A little bit transparent, the top got shorter after I wash it but it’s ok 👌🏻

The top was super tight for a large and the bottoms were baggy in the legs but tight in the stomach. I’d probably size up especially if you have a larger chest
Comfy. Top is a little big and not as snug as it should be. But cute outfit
Super cute! Good thicker material. Hopefully it holds up after lots of washes!

The shorts fit well I’m 275 but the top ran small I wear 38 DDD like one jump or something my breast would be out and about

the amount of random compliments i've received from this set is unbelievable! it is so comfy and such a great matching loungewear set. there are so many different colors it was hard to choose from but this blue was my favorite!

Love this comfy matching shirt set. It’s a comfortable cotton. The shorts are high waisted, so it covers my tummy and meets the crop about and inch above, so I’m showing a little skin but not too much. Love it for walking around town.
I love this outfit it become one of my favs. Really comfy and cute to wear. Looks good on all sizes not just the model pics. If u are worried how it will looks on ur body it looks great on all ❤️
This set is so cute!! Super comfy & casual!
Fits true to size very soft

I originally loved this but after washing it twice, it shrunk so much and no longer covers my boobs or butt. While I bought it for lounge wear, I still need it to be appropriate enough to walk to my mail box in. I ordered a medium and now fits like an extra small
Got this for a recent trip. It fit as expected & it was comfy. I will be ordering more in different colors. For reference, I’m 5’7” & 180lbs.
Gave this as a gift for me daughter. Fits her perfect. Super comfy. Love the color.

I wanted something for around the house that would be cute yet comfortable, and this was the perfect outfit! I am 5'7 and 160 pounds. I went with an XL, and it was a comfortable loose fit. Very flattering!

评论概述: Cute but top is really small.
